title: Virgin of the Secret Service
overview: Virgin of the Secret Service is a series set in the early 1900s that follows the adventures of Captain Robert Virgin, an officer working for the British Secret Service who is dispatched to different parts of the world to battle with enemies of the British Empire.Armed only with intelligence, ingenuity, physical strength and abundant charm, Virgin faces every sort of peril as he defends King and Country â€“ from industrial espionage to anarchist bomb plots, assassination attempts to kidnapping. Only one thing is guaranteed: he will encounter danger wherever he goes!
